received_date: Date the product was received into inventory
lpo: Last Purchase Order reference or identifier.
in_season: Indicates whether the product is currently in season (true/false)
product: Name or description of the product
shelf_life_days: Number of days the product can be stored before expiration
sales_volume: Sales volume of the product over a specific period
reorder_point: Stock level at which a reorder should be triggered
unit_of_measurement: Unit used to measure the product (e.g., kg, unit, liter)
distance_km: Distance in kilometers between supplier and distribution center
temperature_classification: Temperature classification of the day (e.g., hot, cold)
weather_severity: Overall severity of the weather (e.g., mild, moderate, severe)
day_classification: Classification of the day (e.g., weekday, weekend, holiday)
is_holiday: Indicates whether the day is a holiday (true/false)
is_weekend: Indicates whether the day falls on a weekend (true/false)
sales_demand: Estimated sales demand for the product
